entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
